data.text:
@UNGeneva Nigeria 🇳🇬 is a failed state loot and burn 🔥 gov Buhari died 2017 terrorist is in charge of Nigeria 🇳🇬 
#FreeMaziNnamdiKanufreeBiafra 
#FreeSundayIgboho 
#ReferendumNow https://t.co/XzQk74ACP4 https://t.co/aFFdsznqEB

@UNGeneva Where is the UN? Sec Antonio Guterres should be in Kyiv/Moscow trying to broker/promote peace & not in NYC! Go make peace! Stop the fighting/killing! That is your job! YOU HAVE FAILED WITH YOUR IGNORANCE & INACTION! Stop the war! Stop the killing! YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!
@UNGeneva Stop keeping a deaf ear on Uganda issues where Dictator museveni has turned it to kidnap and kill Ugandans
